gamerule.rainbowkittytweaks.commandBlock: Allow command blocks to execute commands
gamerule.rainbowkittytweaks.fireArrowsLi: Flaming arrows ignite blocks on impact
gamerule.rainbowkittytweaks.craftableNam: Allow players to craft name tags
gamerule.rainbowkittytweaks.cheaperRails: Use cheaper crafting recipes for rails
Use cheaper crafting recipe for maps
gamerule.rainbowkittytweaks.legArmorProt: Leg Armor Protects From Berry Thorns
Prevent berry bush damage when wearing leg armor or mount armor
gamerule.rainbowkittytweaks.giveAllRecip: Unlock all crafting recipes for players on spawn
gamerule.rainbowkittytweaks.ironGolemReg: Number of ticks between each regeneration event for iron golems (0 to disable)
Number of ticks after taking damage before iron golem regeneration can start (0 to disable)
